wikipedia_page.main:
John Brunning is an English radio presenter, musician and composer. On Classic FM he presents Classic FM Drive, and the weekday early evening editions of Smooth Classics.
Brunning was born in Essex and from 1970 broadcast pirate radio from his home in Colchester. He learned guitar and played for a time with the successful band Mungo Jerry.  In 1986 he began broadcasting on local radio. He is the only Classic FM presenter to work with the station since it began broadcasting.

response: *29 June – Tim Lihoreau replaces Mark Forrest as host of Classic FM's weekday breakfast show with Jane Jones taking over the weekend breakfast show which Tim vacated and John Brunning replaces Mark as printer of weekly Classic FM chart show.Breakfast schedule changes at Classic FM
